name: Astro Gangsta
description:
Credits

Brian Winn

Declan McClintock

Enhancements by

Pablo Montijo

Minor Modifications:

Modified Menus, Changed Game Music for Level 3

Major Modifications

Created Level 1. In Level 1 the player is allowed up to 2 jumps. Health pickups are available to complete the game. Complexity level is low.

Created Level 2. In Level 2 the player has to get keys to open doors and complete the game. Mobile platform combinations were added to increase complexity.

Created Level 3. Level 3 is a scroller type game. The player is allowed to jump up to 5 times and there are the max health is 10. The complexity level is higher, but players will be able to complete the level if they make use of the health pickups.
